questions.questionTitle: What does the woman want to do?
What does the man say about Lacy?
anwers: She wants to work more often.
She is looking for a different job.

questions.questionTitle: What day will the woman probably take off?

script:
� Paul, could you cover my shift for me on Friday? I'm flying to Las Vegas for the weekend, and I could really use the extra day off.
� Sorry, but I'm scheduled to work that day. Have you asked Lacy? She's always looking to get more hours.
� Yeah, I did. But she has a dentist appointment on the same day.
� Why don't you take the next Monday off instead? I can work that shift for you, and you can still get a three-day weekend.
